{{IN|bedrock|education}}, lapis lazuli, bone meal, and ink sacs, singly or in any combination, can be substituted for blue dye, white dye, and black dye, respectively, in any recipe. These substitutions are not shown in the recipes given here. Substitution must be total: You cannot use a combination of lapis lazuli and blue dye in the same recipe, for example.

{{crafting
|head = 1
|showname = 1|Bone Meal;Lily of the Valley
|Output = White Dye
|ignoreusage = 1
}}
{{crafting
|ingredients = [[Black Dye]] +<br>[[White Dye]] +<br>[[White Dye]]<br>'''--or--'''<br>

[[Azure Bluet]] or<br>[[Oxeye Daisy]] or<br>[[White Tulip]]|White Dye;White Dye;;;|Black Dye;Gray Dye;Azure Bluet;Oxeye Daisy;White Tulip|White Dye;;;;

|ignoreusage = 1
}}
